item.title: White House to share ballroom plans with commission in January
item.description: The White House will present its ballroom plans to the National Capital Planning Commission at a meeting next month.

item.title: California auditor finds millions in wasted dollars in state agencies
item.description: The California State Auditor's office found that several agencies wasted, misused or failed to report over $5 million in funds.

item.title: 5 questions about the wave of congressional comeback campaigns
item.description: Former lawmakers across the country are attempting political comebacks, driven by what they describe as high stakes with President Trump in office and...

item.title: Stalled spending bills put Congress in catch-up mode when lawmakers return in January
item.description: Congress has not passed any spending bills since the 43-day government shutdown ended, and lawmakers won't have much time left to act when they return...

item.title: Zelenskyy says he's meeting with Trump in Florida Sunday
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said he will meet with President Trump over the weekend in Florida to try to find an end to the four-year war ...
